vrlab.foodui.detectableObjects

Class Fruit

  • java.lang.Object
    • vrlab.foodui.detectableObjects.Fruit

  • public class Fruit
extends java.lang.Object
    class for located fruits, consists of a FruitType, the contour and relevant positions such as the mass center or the label location (defined as the outermost point on the right)
